TEXT.TITLE: VARIAN <VAR> GETS <TOSHIBA CORP> CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Varian Associates Inc said it has received a three-year contract worth over 30 mln dlrs from Toshiba Corp to supply anode X-ray generating tubes for Toshiba's line of computerized tomography scanners. Reuter
